hero.title: amuzed first mint edition booster packs
hero.paragraph: It's the final step before the launch of the AMUZED Game - Get the limited First Mint Edition Packs while stock lasts!
hero.warning: All Booster Pack buyers will be able to win insane prizes
hero.warning-link: a PlayStation 5, AirPods Pro Max, or Spotify vouchers

collect.title: Collect
collect.paragraph: Be the first to get your hands on 3 Artist Cards in each pack before the game launches!

play-to-earn.title: Play
play-to-earn.paragraph: Who is part of your dream label? Choose five artist cards for the weekly battles and create a line-up that destroys every competitor.

trade.title: EARN
trade.paragraph: No matter if you sell your artists to other labels or use them to win one tournament after another. The goal is always: Get the rewards you deserve!

booster-packs.title: Booster Packs
booster-packs.paragraph: Each pack contains 3 random and strictly limited artist cards from German and French artists.

faq-1.question: Why should I buy Booster Packs?
faq-1.answer: You will get random Artist Cards for a discounted price. This drop is a thank you to the community that has supported us since day one.

faq-2.question: What's inside the Booster Packs?
faq-2.answer: Each Booster Pack contains three artist cards. You will find more information on each pack's detail page.

faq-3.question: How many Booster Packs will be available?
faq-3.answer: We don't want to limit the number of Booster Packs. But since the Artist Cards are limited, the Booster Packs will only be available while stocks last.

faq-4.question: How can I participate in the raffle?
faq-4.answer: Everyone who buys a Booster Pack automatically enters the raffle. On October 14, 2022, we will give away insane prizes like a PlayStation 5, AirPods Pro Max, or Spotify vouchers.
